name: Spike 'Rust' Weaver
description: A haggard figure hunched over a makeshift stall made of scrap metal and patched wires. Rust stains his weathered face and corroded cybernetic arm, a constant reminder of his mutation. His eyes gleam with an unsettling yellow tint.

personality.voice: Static-laced monotone with a raspy undertone.
personality.agenda: Maximize profits by selling scavenged goods, while minimizing risk of exposure to authorities and rival gangs.
personality.background: Spike was once a low-level technician in the Zenith Corp's robotics division. A lab accident involving experimental rust inhibitors caused his mutation, leaving him ostracized from society.

flavor.rationale: Spike is one of the many scavengers who sift through Zenith-9's industrial ruins for valuable components to sell on the black market, a living testament to the city's decay.
